post.summary: Import all books from a file.
post.description: Import all books from a file, deleting all the previous books in the database

parameters.name: keywords-to-topics
parameters.description: If true, topics will be created from keywords (Uniliber doesn't export topics). DEAFULT: false

parameters.name: clean-description
parameters.description: If true, the description will be cleaned from <p> and </p> tags. DEAFULT: false

500.description: Books not imported

post.summary: Export all books to a file.
post.description: Export all books to a file, in the specefied format and file extension.

parameters.name: file-extension
parameters.description: File extension of the exported file

204.description: Books exported

500.description: Books not imported

post.description: Login a store with email and password.

200.description: The store has been successfully logged in.

post.description: Login a customer with email and password.

200.description: The customer has been successfully logged in.

post.description: Login an admin with email and password.

200.description: The admin has been successfully logged in.

post.description: Register a store with email and password.

201.description: The store has been successfully registered.

422.description: The password must be at least 8 characters long.

500.description: Error creating user.

post.description: Register a customer with email and password.

201.description: The customer has been successfully registered.

422.description: The password must be at least 8 characters long.

500.description: Error creating user.

post.description: Confirm the email of a store to complete the registration process.

204.description: The email has been successfully confirmed.

500.description: Error confirming email.

post.description: Confirm the email of a customer to complete the registration process.

204.description: The email has been successfully confirmed.

500.description: Error confirming email.

post.description: Send an email to the store with a link to reset the password.

204.description: The email has been successfully sent.

post.description: Send an email to the customer with a link to reset the password.

204.description: The email has been successfully sent.

post.description: Reset the password of a store with the hash sent by email.

204.description: The password has been successfully reset.

422.description: The password must be at least 8 characters long.

post.description: Reset the password of a customer with the hash sent by email.

204.description: The password has been successfully reset.

422.description: The password must be at least 8 characters long.

post.description: [*] Logout the user by removing the token from the request object.

204.description: The user has been successfully logged out.

401.description: The user is not logged in.

500.description: Error logging out.

get.description: [*] Get the user data of the user in the request object.

200.description: The user data has been successfully retrieved.

401.description: The user is not logged in.

delete.description: [*] Soft-delete the user in the request object.

204.description: The user has been successfully deleted.

401.description: The user is not logged in.

patch.description: [*] Update the store data of the user in the request object.

204.description: The store data has been successfully updated.

401.description: The user is not logged in.

patch.description: [*] Update the customer data of the user in the request object.

204.description: The customer data has been successfully updated.

401.description: The user is not logged in.

patch.description: [*] Update the password of the user in the request object.

204.description: The password has been successfully updated.

401.description: The user is not logged in.

info.title: Librera Santa Brbara API
info.description: API documentation for Librera Santa Brbara

location_id.description: The id of the location where book is stored

status_id.description: The id of the status of the book

ref.description: The external id/reference of the book. Should be unique.

publication_place.description: The publication place (country, region, etc.) of the book

collection.example: Coleco: Obras de J. R. R. Tolkien

year.description: The publication year of the book

size.description: The size of the book (height x width)

weight.description: The weight of the book (in grams)

pages.description: The number of pages of the book

description.example: The Lord of the Rings is an epic high-fantasy novel

private_note.description: A private note that only the store can see

sold_at.description: The date when the book was sold
